member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.ClickEventData
member.summary: Class storing information required to create a redirecting link to be displayed on canvases which do not offer a callback for click events, like VS Code and Code reviews. The link will log a click event and redirect to actual site requested by user, like VSO or Watson website.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.ClickEventData.HostVersion
member.summary: The host Application for dev canvas client, like VS or VS Code.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.ClickEventData.ClientType
member.summary: The dev canvas client type, like VS Extension or VS Code extension or CRBot.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.ClickEventData.ClientVersion
member.summary: The dev canvas client version.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.IInsightAction
member.summary: Interface for the actions displayed under the light bulb when user click on or moves the cursor to the highlighted line for a particular insight in VS.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.IInsightAction.Label
member.summary: Label for the button to be displayed in VS for this action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.IInsightAction.Description
member.summary: Text to be dispalyed in VS when user hovers over the button for this action.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.IInsightAction.InvokeAction
member.summary: Method containing actions to be performed when user clicks on the button for this action.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.InsightActionV1
member.summary: Class representing a action (e.g. opening a web page) shown as an option under the light bulb when user moves the cursor to the lightlighted line in Visual studio.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.InsightActionV1.InsightActionId
member.summary: Identifier for the action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.InsightActionV1.Label
member.summary: Label for the button to be displayed in VS for this action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.InsightActionV1.Description
member.summary: Text to be displayed in VS when user hovers over the button for this action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.InsightActionV1.Url
member.summary: URL to be used to start a process, e.g. the ones starting with http:// or mailto://

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.LaunchWebsiteInsightAction
member.summary: Action for launching a process (e.g. a web page in a browser or an email client) through a URL.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.LaunchWebsiteInsightAction.Label
member.summary: Label for the button to be displayed in VS for this action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.LaunchWebsiteInsightAction.Description
member.summary: Text to be dispalyed in VS when user hovers over the button for this action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.LaunchWebsiteInsightAction.Url
member.summary: URL to be used to start a process, e.g. the ones starting with http:// or mailto://

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightActions.LaunchWebsiteInsightAction.InvokeAction
member.summary: Launches a new process wing the property.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightWebEnvironment
member.summary: This class enables insight related code to experiment and test new functionality. The environment will be determined from a number of parameters (typically deployment environment). The consumer can use this for experimenting with new functionality in a controlled fashion.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightWebEnvironment.NotProdEnvironment
member.summary: Returns true if running in a known, not-PROD environment. I.e. will return false if the environment is PROD or unknown.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightWebEnvironment.ProdEnvironment
member.summary: Returns true if running in the prod environment, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.IInsightGeneratorInfo
member.summary: Class to store metadata about insight generator and about type of insights it provides.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.IInsightGeneratorInfo.Name
member.summary: The name for this insight gnenerator, intended to be used for request and receiving insights between DevCanvas clients and the server (not to be displayed to the users).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.IInsightGeneratorInfo.Id
member.summary: The unique Id for this insight generator

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.IInsightGeneratorInfo.InsightDisplayName
member.summary: The name string to be displayed to users for the type of insights generated by this insight generator.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.IInsightGeneratorInfo.FeedbackEmail
member.summary: Feedback contact, in case it is to be displayed to the users.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.IInsightGeneratorInfo.Description
member.summary: Description, mostly about the type of insights generated by this insight generator and intended to be displayed to the user.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.InsightGeneratorInfoV7
member.summary: Insight generator information. Includes new abbreviated 'ShortName' property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.InsightGeneratorInfoV7.ShortName
member.summary: Abbreviated 6-character version of 'Name' for use in certain space-limited client-side scenarios. Should be all-caps and simply represent 'Name' in condensed form.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.InsightGeneratorInfoV6
member.summary: Insight generator information. There are no changes between V5 and V6.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.InsightGeneratorInfoV8
member.summary: Insight generator information. Includes new AboutLink property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.InsightGeneratorInfoV8.AboutLink
member.summary: This is the about link where the end-user can get more information about the insight from insight generator.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGeneratorInfos.InsightGeneratorInfoV5
member.summary: Insight generator information. Version v1 thorugh v4 do not exists since we are starting with v5 to maintain consistency with the Request and Insight version number.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGenerators.InsightGeneratorV1
member.summary: Abstract class to be used as a contract for a class generating insights. This class is deprecated and should not be used.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGenerators.InsightGeneratorV7.ShortName

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightGenerators.InsightGeneratorV7.Generate(System.String,System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal,Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceInformation,Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.ClickEventData)
member.summary: Get insights for given file.
member.param: Path of the file relative to the repo root for which insights are being requested. Directories will be delimited by back-slashes ('\'). Generators should do a case-insensitive match against this string.
The principal object of the user requesting insights. Can be used to check the user's auth.
Source control information associated with the file.

Object storing data which is logged when user clicks on links in the insights. Links in the markdown presentation of insight point to a redirector which logs the click event before redirecting to the actual website (e.g. VSO or Watson website).
member.returns: Object of a class that implements IInsight interface.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightPresentation
member.summary: Class to store different visualizations of an insight to be shown on different canvases.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightPresentation.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightPresentation.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor with the four presentation types.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightPresentation.Text
member.summary: Text is the default presentation option. If no other presentation is specified the Text will get wrapped in default Xaml/Markdown/HTML for presentation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightPresentation.Xaml
member.summary: Xaml specifies how insight data should be rendered in Visual Studio.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightPresentation.Markdown
member.summary: Markdown specifies how insight data should be rendered on VSTS.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightPresentation.Html
member.summary: Html specifies how insight data should be rendered in the browser.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightStatistics.IInsightStatisticsGenerator
member.summary: Interface defining the statistics to be collected from insight generators. The generators which want their stats to be logged through the event logger tool should implement this interface.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightStatistics.IInsightStatisticsGenerator.InsightTypeName
member.summary: Name of the Insight type to be logged against the metric values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightStatistics.IInsightStatisticsGenerator.GetTotalViewableInsightPresentations
member.summary: Method to get total number of viewable insight presentations, i.e. those for which insights have been mapped to a file and line of code in a repository. Said another way, this is the total structures this generator may return.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightStatistics.IInsightStatisticsGenerator.GetTotalViewableInsightInfos
member.summary: Method to get a count of total unique contained in viewable returned by the generator (i.e. failures/error/information pieces). A viewable InsightInfo is contained in an Insight that has associated line of code, so that it can be presented. This may or may not be same as value returned by GetTotalViewableInsightPresentations, based on whether we are showing a single or multiple InsightInfos in a single insight presentation/pop-up and whether an InsightInfo can be present in multiple insights.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightStatistics.IInsightStatisticsGenerator.GetTotalNonViewableInsightInfos
member.summary: Method to get a total number of unique non viewable insightinfos (i.e. they have not been mapped to a line in a repo). A non-viewable InsightInfo would perhaps be contained in an Insight that doesn't have an associated line of code, so it can't presented. Any insight generator which is unable to report this metric here should throw a not implemented exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightStatistics.IInsightStatisticsGenerator.GetTotalViewableInsightInfosWithBugs
member.summary: Method to get total number of unique insightinfos which have one or more bugs associated with them. This should not consider other work item types like IcM and Issues.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightStatistics.IInsightStatisticsGenerator.GetTotalViewableBugs
member.summary: Method to get total number of unique bugs associated with at least one viewable insight presentation for given type of insight.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightStatistics.IInsightStatisticsGenerator.GetTotalInsightPresentationsByRank
member.summary: Method to get total number of insight presentation for ranks 1 through 3.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightStatistics.IInsightStatisticsGenerator.GetCustomMetrics
member.summary: Method to get any special metrics that an Insight generator wants to log.
member.returns: Dictionary mapping metric name (string) to metric value (integer).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.IInsightTelemetry.GetTelemetryObject
member.summary: Returns an anonymous object that contains all the fields that should be logged for telemetry purposes. Note that some telemetry methods may not be able to serialize this object and in that case the string returned from GetTelemetryString should be used instead.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.IInsightTelemetry.GetTelemetryString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a string representing this object to be logged for telemetry purposes. Typically this is a JSON string of the serialized object returned by GetTelemetryObject. Use this method if your telemetry method (e.g. EventSource) has trouble serializing the object returned by GetTelemtryObject. Implementers should consider caching this string for performance reasons. The refresh parameter can be used by callers to ensure the string returned is up to date.
member.param: Set this to true to ensure the string returned reflects the current state.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightInfoV1
member.summary: Class containing an individual issue, error or piece of information that helps qualify the insight.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightInfoV1.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for InsightInfoList. For example: a failure hash, error code, expression, event name, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightInfoV1.Name
member.summary: Human readable version for the Id.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightInfoV1.WorkItemList
member.summary: This represents a list of associated engineering work items (e.g. bugs).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightInfoV1.Source
member.summary: Semi-colon delimited string denoting the source(s) of telemetry that generated this piece of information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightInfoV1.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor to set id and name for the InsightInfo class
member.param: Unique identifier. For example: a failure hash, error code, expression, event name, etc.
Human readable version of the id

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV7.BugId
member.summary: VSO Bug number associated with this insight.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV7.Source
member.summary: Semi-colon delimited string denoting the source(s) of telemetry that generated this insight.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV7.InsightGeneratorId
member.summary: Unique identifier for the generator of this insight.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV7.Rank
member.summary: A value of 1-3 indicating how "important" this insight is, 1 being the most "important" and 3 being the least. The definition of "important" is up to the insight generator. On the client side, users have a setting that filters out insights based on each insight's Rank value. Only insights whose Rank is less than or equal to the Rank filter value are shown to the user. E.g.: If the user has set their Rank filter to 2 then only insights whose Rank is 1 or 2 will be shown. Insights with a Rank of 3 will not be shown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV7.InsightDescription
member.summary: This should be a short string that helps characterize the insight for the end-user. This can be a failure signature, expression, or other short summary. Use InsightText for the actual source code line.

member.summary: This is the primary link where the end-user can get more information about this insight.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightId
member.summary: Uniquely identifies the insight in terms of presentation. This value is based upon the , , , , and the Ids of the . It is automatically generated and cannot be directly set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightInfosId
member.summary: Uniquely identifies individual failures, issues, errors etc. This value is based upon the , , and the Ids of the . It is automatically generated and cannot be directly set.

member.summary: The type of insight. E.g. "WatsonFailure", "WILError", etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightFilePath
member.summary: Path relative to root of the repo for the file which has the line of code for which this insight is generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightLifeSpan
member.summary: Time span for which this insight will be cached on the code editor extensions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.EstimatedLineNumber
member.summary: Line number of the line of code for which this insight is generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.StartLineNumberRange
member.summary: Line number from which the code editor extensions should start searching for given code text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.EndLineNumberRange
member.summary: Line number upto which the code editor extensions should search for given code text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightText
member.summary: The code text / line of code for which this insight is generated. Clients will perform an exact, case-sensitive match on this string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.CallingFunction
member.summary: The name of the function that is calling (i.e. contains) the line of code represented by InsightText. This is optional, but if provided it can greatly increase the client's line-matching accuracy. Preferred formats: "Function" (C code) "Class::Method" (C++ code) "Namespace::Class::Method" (C# and C++ code) Note that adhering to the preferred formats isn't strictly required, but the closer to the preferred format you get, the more likely it is that the client will be able to make use of it.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightActions
member.summary: The actions to be displayed under the blub in the Visual Studio, when a user clicks on the highlighted line of code corresponding to this insight. These are typically external links and are mainly provided for accessibility reasons. In general: * There should be at least one action per item in the InsightInfoList. * If an InsightInfoList item has one or more WorkItems, there should be at least one action for the first WorkItem.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightData
member.summary: Optional additional data (e.g. Insight type specific data) to be sent for this insight.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightPresentation
member.summary: An InsightPresentation object which stores different visual representations of this insights to be displayed in different types on code editors / canvases.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightGeneratorId
member.summary: Unique identifier for the generator of this insight.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.Rank
member.summary: A value of 1-3 indicating how "important" this insight is, 1 being the most "important" and 3 being the least. The definition of "important" is up to the insight generator. On the client side, users have a setting that filters out insights based on each insight's Rank value. Only insights whose Rank is less than or equal to the Rank filter value are shown to the user. E.g.: If the user has set their Rank filter to 2 then only insights whose Rank is 1 or 2 will be shown. Insights with a Rank of 3 will not be shown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.SubRank
member.summary: A value indicating the importance of this insight relative to other insights with the same Rank value. This allows the client to further order insights with the same Rank value if necessary. A lower value is more "important" than a higher value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightDescription
member.summary: This should be a short string that helps characterize the insight for the end-user. This can be a failure signature, expression, or other short summary. Use InsightText for the actual source code line.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.PrimaryLink
member.summary: This is the primary link where the end-user can get more information about this insight.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.InsightInfoList
member.summary: List of individual issues, errors or information that help qualify the insight.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightInfoV1},System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an InsightV8 object.
member.param: A list of InsightInfoV1 objects. It must contain at least one entry.
A name describing the type of insight, e.g. "WatsonFailure", "WILError", etc.
The repo-rooted path to the file to which this insight applies.
The estimated line number to which this insight applies.
The actual text of the line of code to which this insight applies.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.GetTelemetryObject
member.summary: Returns an anonymous object that contains all the fields of this structure that should be logged for telemetry. Some telemetry methods may not be able to serialize this. In that case, use GetTelemetryString.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.Insights.InsightV8.GetTelemetryString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the serialized JSON string representation of the object returned by GetTelemetryObject. Use this string if the telemetry method being used is unable to serialize the object returned by GetTelemetryObject.
member.param: Set this to true to ensure the string returned represents the current state of the Insight.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightUtilities
member.summary: Class for utility methods.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.InsightUtilities.GenerateGuidForString(System.String)
member.summary: Method to get a GUID to indentify a string. The guid is deterministic, i.e. for a particular string, same GUID will be returned for multiple invocations of this method. The method first creates a SHA1 hash from the string and the populates guid bytes from that hash.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.CanvasClientType
member.summary: Enum for the clients created for different developer canvases

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.ListExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.ListExtensions.Compare``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},System.Collections.Generic.List{``0})
member.summary: Compares two lists (using the given type's Equals() method) and returns a value indicating how they match.
member.returns: 0 indicates an exact match (both lists are the same length and all elements match). A positive value indicates all elements in the second list match the first but the first has more elements than the second. A negative value indicates all elements in the first list match the second but the first has fewer elements than the second. A null value indicates at least one element (at the same valid index in both lists) does not match.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.StringExtensions
member.summary: This static class contains extension methods for the "string" class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.StringExtensions.Truncate(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Truncates the given string . If is greater than 's length then it is returned as-is.
member.param: The string to truncate.
The maximum number of characters to return.
member.returns: The string, truncated up to characters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.StringExtensions.Contains(System.String,System.String,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Version of Contains that allows for ignoring case.
member.param: The source string.
The value to look for in the source string.
One of the values that specifies the rules for the search.

member.summary: Class storing client canvas attributes like file path, git head, git config, etc. which will determine which insights will be returned to the client.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.GitConfig
P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.GitConfig.Sections
member.summary: The set of sections in the git config, keyed by name.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.GitConfig.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Pass the contents of the .git\config file to the constructor and the resulting object will represent the contents
member.param: The contents of the .git\config file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.GitConfigSection
member.summary: Represents a section (or subsection) in a git config. Don't instantiate this yourself, use the GitConfig class to build the git config representation. If this is a section, then it may have zero or more subsections and zero or more Values. If this is a subsection, then it will just have one or more Values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.GitConfigSection.SubSections
member.summary: The set of sub-sections in this section (if any). If the owning object is already a sub-section then this will be empty.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.GitConfigSection.Variables
member.summary: The set of variables (name/value pairs) in this section (or sub-section).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceControlUtilities
member.summary: Utility class for extracting source control information. Note that the word 'repository' used in comments and in variable names has been used in generic sense, i.e. it refers can refer to a Git repository as well as a Source Depot.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceControlUtilities.GetSourceInformation(System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@)
member.summary: Gets the source control information for file's repository.
member.param: Path to the file whose repository's information is needed. Typically, this would be the file for which insights are to be displayed.
Path of the file relative to the root of the repository.
Path to the root of the repository.
Errors encountered while parsing source information.

member.summary: Gets name of the current branch the user is on.
member.param: Contents on .git\HEAD file

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceControlUtilities.GetBranchNameFromGitUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Gets name of the current branch from the git URL.
member.param: git URL for a given file on a particular branch

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceControlUtilities.ExtractGitProperties(System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@)
member.summary: Parses Git config file to return source control information like git server, project and repository name. This method throws an exception if the git config is not in expected format and the caller is expected to handle those exceptions appropriately.
member.param: Git config file path.
Git server for the repository.
Project under which the repo has been created.
Repository name.
List of errors encountered while parsing Git config.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceControlUtilities.CleanLocalFilePath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Cleans up a local file path and returns its path relative to the repository's root. E.g. if the local file path is D:/code/os/src/minio/ndis/sys/aoac.c and repository's root directory is D:/code/os/src/, this function will return /minio/ndis/sys/aoac.c Additionally it also handles special paths generated when code files are opened though WinIDE extension.
member.param: Path of a file as seen by dev

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceControlUtilities.ParseGitUrl(System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Parses the server, project, and repository out of a full git-based repository URL. E.g. if = "https://dev.azure.com/microsoft/os/_git/os" then = "https://dev.azure.com/microsoft", = "os", and = "os". Note that some URLs, like GitHub, may not have a . It is the caller's responsibility to check the validity of each extracted part.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceInformation.RepoIdentity
member.summary: Values in this enum represent some classification of known repositories. This can include groupings for a particular repo or a set of repos. Add values and logic to GetRepo() as needed. Similarly, this may be more appropraite as 'flags' rather than 'enum' as functionality is expanded.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceInformation.RepoIdentity.Unknown
member.summary: The repo is not known.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceInformation.RepoIdentity.OS
member.summary: This is the main Windows OS repo.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceInformation.RepoIdentity.DevDiv
member.summary: This is a repo under DevDiv. Essentially, but not limited to, Visual Studio.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceInformation.RepoIdentity.Office
member.summary: This is the Office repository.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Internal.Fungates.DeveloperCanvas.Insight.SourceInformation.GetRepoIdentity
member.summary: Returns the repo represented by this object, if known.

member.summary: For the given source information, returns the known repo it represents.
member.param: The source control type, e.g. git.
The server where the repo resides.
The project that owns the repo. This can be a GUID or a string.
The repo itself. This can be a GUID or a string.
